short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,de,en,en_AU,en_GB,en_U: Play Merge Fruit games right now. Discover the Joy of palying this game - Your Ultimate Online Happy Experience! Try it now!
short.da: Spil flette frugt lige nu. Oplev glæden ved at palyere dette spil - din ultimative online lykkelige oplevelse! Prøv det nu!
short.el: Παίξτε συγχωνεύστε φρούτα τώρα. Ανακαλύψτε τη χαρά του Palying αυτού του παιχνιδιού - την απόλυτη σε απευθείας σύνδεση ευτυχισμένη…
short.es: Juega Fusion Fruit ahora mismo. Descubra la alegría de palidecer este juego, ¡tu mejor experiencia feliz en línea! ¡Pruebalo ahora!
short.et: MÄNGIMINE ÜHENDI VIIMI KOHE. Avastage selle mängu rõõmustamise rõõm - teie ülim veebipõhine õnnelik kogemus! Proovige seda kohe!
short.ja: 今すぐマージフルーツを再生してください。このゲームを味わう喜びを発見してください - あなたの究極のオンラインハッピーエクスペリエンス！やってみよう！
short.ko: 지금 당장 병합 과일을 연주하십시오. 이 게임을 Pallying의 기쁨을 발견하십시오 - 당신의 최고의 온라인 행복한 경험! 지금 시도해보십시오!
short.nl: Speel nu fruit samen. Ontdek de vreugde van het palyen van dit spel - je ultieme online gelukkige ervaring! Probeer het nu!
short.tr: Şu anda birleştirme meyvesi oynayın. Bu oyunu palying sevincini keşfedin - nihai çevrimiçi mutlu deneyiminiz! Şimdi dene!
short.vi: Chơi hợp nhất trái cây ngay bây giờ. Khám phá niềm vui của trò chơi này - trải nghiệm hạnh phúc trực tuyến cuối cùng của bạn! Thử…
short.zh_CN: 立即玩合并水果。发现这款游戏的启动的乐趣 - 您的最终在线快乐体验！现在就试试！
short.zh_TW: 立即玩合併水果。發現這款遊戲的啟動的樂趣 - 您的最終在線快樂體驗！現在就試試！

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Play Merge Fruit games right now. Discover the Joy of palying this game - Your Ultimate Online Happy Experience! Try it now!

Introduction
Merge Fruit is an addictive and delightful mobile game that allows players to experience the joy of cultivating their own fruit orchard. Developed by Garden Games Inc., this engaging game challenges players to merge and combine different fruits to grow and harvest a diverse range of delicious and exotic fruits. With its charming graphics, relaxing gameplay, and rewarding progression system, Merge Fruit offers a refreshing and entertaining experience for players of all ages.

Gameplay
In Merge Fruit, players start with a small plot of land and a handful of basic fruits. By merging identical fruits, players can create new and more valuable fruits. As the orchard grows, players can merge higher-tier fruits to unlock even rarer and more valuable varieties. The goal is to merge and harvest as many fruits as possible, earning coins and experience points to expand the orchard and unlock new features and fruit types.
